full_summary:
# Tender Notice


## 1. Tender Details

- **Title**: Agile Toolkit Solution
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01026968
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: ScaleUp011
- **Publication Date**: February 21, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 1, 2023, at 14:00 EST
- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Limited Tendering


## 2. Overview

The Canadian Government, through Shared Services Canada (SSC), invites interested micro and small businesses to participate in the Agile Toolkit Solution tender. This procurement aims to improve the user experience of the Centre of Expertise in Agile and Innovative Procurement (CoEAIP)’s SharePoint community site and make recommendations for accessing the Agile Procurement Process 3.0 (APP3.0) Toolkit.

The tender is part of the Scale Up initiative, which aims to increase the diversity of bidders on government contracts. Interested businesses can register on Canada’s digital marketplace to access this opportunity and future ones.

## 3. Amendments

This tender has undergone two amendments:
1. Amendment 1: The closing date has been extended to March 1, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Corrected versions of the ICB, BSF, and Financial Bid forms have been uploaded. The link for the ITR has been added.
2. Amendment 2: The time zone has been changed from Eastern Daylight Time to Eastern Standard Time.


## 4. Required Documents

The tender package includes four documents in both official languages. Interested businesses must:
1. Download and review the ScaleUp Standard Instructions document
2. Complete the Bid Solicitation Form (BSF) interactively
3. Complete the Financial Bid Form (highlighted in green)
4. Submit only the completed BSF and Financial Bid Form to the contracting authority


## 5. Submission Guidelines

For assistance or questions, please contact the Contracting Authority: 
Morgan, James
Email: james.morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca
Phone: 604-715-7515


## 6. Contract Value

The total value of a resulting contract, including any subsequent amendments or options exercised, will not exceed $238,000 (taxes included). Canada reserves the right to award multiple contracts as a result of this solicitation. 

[Attachments include the original tender documents
